subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby took over the N.H.L. scoring lead with a career-high 6 points as the host Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Philadelphia Flyers, 8-4, Wednesday night.
snippet: Sidney Crosby took over the N.H.L. scoring lead with a career-high 6 points as the host Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Philadelphia Flyers, 8-4, Wednesday night.
